alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Juneau (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 10 at 7:23PM AKST until March 11 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...North to northeast winds 35 mph with gusts of 60 to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Downtown Juneau and Douglas. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Damaging winds will blow around loose debris and may blow down trees and power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Generally, the winds have diminished during the afternoon and evening hours. Winds are expected to increase through the overnight hours, again. There is still some uncertainty as to whether a true Taku wind event will develop, reaching high wind criteria, again tonight.
info.instruction: A high wind warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring.
